title: You Tell Us: What’s Your Favorite Warm, Winter Drink In Town?
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
The past week has finally moved us into temperatures that call for turning the heat on at night (but not if you live in the Nashvillest HQ), and we’ve found ourselves scurrying to the store several times for more milk, hot chocolate, apple cider, spiced rum, tea, coffee and… pumpkin beer. A few local coffee shops have concocted delicious warm beverages just for this type of weather, but we want to know what YOUR favorites are (and yes, alcoholic drink suggestions are more than welcome). Is it Crema’s Mayan Hot Chocolate? Bongo Java’s “Apple Pie” Cider? Or are you a sucker for Starbucks’ Pumpkin Spice Latte? And while we’re at it, does anywhere in this town serve a great hot buttered rum? 

You’re welcome to share drinks you enjoy at home, but mega bonus points if it’s available at a Nashville coffee shop, restaurant or bar.
